6, the Connect X9 Super NIC, the

the extremely large context lengths we
are going to give our next models, 10
million token context windows. And it's

AI factory of the future because the

about the whole system and we're

which AMD is explicitly positioning as

Well, here we have it. Hyperscalers

And companies that figure out how to be

power. And so there's a little bit of

large loads that are colllocated with

they're framing this as a reliability

AI scale. If if power becomes something

over time and the strategic play here is

managed MCP endpoints end up being a

And agent ecosystems are going to look a

the explicit scopes the agent has.

something. The products that nail this
are going to earn so much trust. And the
ones that are skipping security right

class product, they're going to miss
